name: Tint
description:
Tint

A meatboy-style platformer with a colourful twist.

This is best played with an Xbox controller, but there are control prompts for keyboard, too!

If you have any problems with the online version (particularly with a gamepad), please download a native binary, as browser support is complex. 

Controls
Move - Left Stick / WASD
Jump - A / Spacebar
Change colour - Left Bumper (hold) + Left Stick / Left Shift (hold) + WASD
Menus - ABXY / Arrow Keys

Debug controls
Return to main menu (from level) - Back / Escape
Clear save data (on main menu) - Delete

Any feedback is wholeheartedly welcomed. :) 

Note - untested on Mac and Linux!
